Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to curb cuts
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Curb Cuts

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of transportation to clean and maintain all medians at least once a year and to create a web-based tracking system
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOT to clean and maintain all medians at least once a year and to create a web-based tracking system.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring curb extensions at certain dangerous intersections
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring curb extensions at certain dangerous intersections.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the condition of bridges, sidewalks and ferries.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Condition of bridges, sidewalks and ferries.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of transportation to report a list of all the sidewalks under its jurisdiction.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of transportation to report a list of all the sidewalks under its jurisdiction.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing the painting of curb cuts
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorizing the painting of curb cuts.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the New York City police department from issuing a violation to a vehicle for illegally parking in a driveway without first confirming the legality of such driveway
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the NYPD from issuing a violation to a vehicle for illegally parking in a driveway without first confirming the legality of such driveway.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to placing greater regulations and restraints on the creation of driveway curb cuts, and providing local community board notification
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Placing greater regulations and restraints on the creation of driveway curb cuts, and providing local community board notification.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of buildings to notify police precincts of complaints regarding illegal curb cuts
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOB to notify police precincts of complaints regarding illegal curb cuts.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey to widen the George Washington Bridge’s sidewalks.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Port Authority of NY and NJ to widen the George Washington Bridge’s sidewalks.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the curbs adjacent to a fire hydrant or bus stop
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Curbs adjacent to a fire hydrant or bus stop.
